main event: Multiple UFO sightings were reported in Albuquerque, New Mexico, in October 1954.
interesting points: Witnesses reported seeing circular, white objects with no trail or exhaust and no sound.
One report described a silver elongated object approximately 40 to 50 feet in length and 15 to 20 feet in width at an altitude of approximately 5,000 feet.
A witness observed three bright glowing objects moving across the sky in formation, maneuvering erratically at high speed.
In another sighting, a bright yellowish-white light was observed in the sky, moving in an erratic manner and at times appearing stationary before disappearing from view.
Investigators recommended further investigation, indicating the significance of the sightings was unknown.
sighted object: circular, white objects, silver elongated object, bright glowing objects, bright yellowish-white light
witnesses: various witnesses including civilians and airport traffic controllers
photographs: no photographs included in the report
